title: A Familiar Shore
description: Meg Marks is a young lawyer raised off the coast of the Carolinas. An anonymous client hires her to arrange his will, then sends her to meet his estranged family at their lake home in northern Michigan.After a shocking discovery, she finds herself caught between his suspicious family and a deathbed promise her conscience demands that she keep.Will she seek revenge? Or something more?
author: Jennifer Fromke
